title: Dedication to Apollo

layout.p: The text occupies two lines with interpuncts visible at the end of line 1 and between words in line 2. It is possible that the text continued below, or to the right, on another block, but it is complete in itself

handNote.lettering: The letters are archaic in form, in particular the square, open P; the form of the R; the off-vertical N, and the rigid S.

date._:
3rd century or early 2nd century BCE (letter
                                forms and orthography)

graphics.desc: Photo J. Prag, courtesy Museo Archeologico Regionale Antonino Salinas
Photo J. Prag, courtesy Museo Archeologico Regionale Antonino Salinas

museum.name: Museo Archeologico Regionale Antonino Salinas
museum.description: Partially reopened following extensive restoration work. Comprehensive collection of archaeological material, predominantly from the West of the island, with an important Etruscan collection.

location.address: Centre of Palermo, Piazza Olivella 24, 90100 - Palermo
